name: Hamster Hammock (Android Game)
description:
A game about swinging hamsters in a hammock (Android Game)

Wreak havoc and Swing as many hamsters in the hammock as you can! But be careful, if you can’t keep the rhythm the hamsters will wake up! 
The more hamsters you manage to collect the more points you get when swinging in the correct tempo. Every point also grants you additional seconds to your timer so make sure you get those points!
Also, watch out for those spiky objects, these will also wake the Hamsters up

Design
The game is based on Downwell’s dual purpose design.
You swing the hammock both to keep the hamsters asleep but also to avoid objects and catch new hamsters. You do all this while trying to keep the hamsters you have inside of the hammock.
Having more hamsters in the hammock makes the game more difficult but you also earn more points!
Points are not only collected to get higher scores, but also to grant you more seconds playing.

Hamster Hammock is a game made for Android smartphones created by Erik Friberg and Oscar Friberg for the GMTK game jam.

Credits
Programming – Oscar Friberg
Graphics / Sounds – Erik Friberg
Music – Bike Rides  by The Green Orbs via Youtube’s Audio Library
Game Engine – Unity
Physics – 2d Soft Body by Konstantin Saetsky

Swing that hammock!
